column2: Rock moments unforgettable pulled who DeGeneres Ellen nominated move pizza honors four speech his delivery Awards year this handed out acceptance award night the Oscar Chicken Roscoe first Waffles audience the recipient Award the speeches emotional performances electrifying played who Lifetime Achievement one Alsina tearful Richie Lionel piano the serenaded audience the August Easy songs his got dancing the hit Long All crowd Night
won also Award Viewer the Choice BET

named Pharrell kicked who was R&B male best Timberlake Brown Legend off show the artist - Justin hit his Come Get It pop upbeat Bae Elliot rapper Missy
scored Alsina Orleans win first the night the overcome was singer nominated who artist new best emotion stage was awards four
won Williams Pharrell each awards two Alsina
